label: Security Services
description: Services related to security, including security jobs, training, and licensing.

subcategories.label: Security Jobs
subcategories.description: Jobs related to security, including static security, armed security, and event security.

subcategories.label: Security Training and Licensing
subcategories.description: Training and licensing related to security, including SIA training and licensing.

subcategories.label: Security Services
subcategories.description: Services related to security, including mobile patrol, keyholding, and close protection.

subcategories.label: Security Companies
subcategories.description: Companies that provide security services, including G4S and Securitas.

subcategories.label: Security Equipment
subcategories.description: Equipment related to security, including CCTV cameras and alarm systems.
